title: Water Advisory — Phantom Ranch and Bright Angel Campground
description: Effective on 1/13 at 4 p.m., a water advisory has been issued for all water in the vicinity of Phantom Ranch and Bright Angel Campground. All drinking water in these areas should be treated or boiled. This advisory will remain in effect for at least 48 hours or longer.

title: Critical Backcountry Updates/Closures
description: Upper portions of trails are snow-packed and icy. Trekking poles and foot traction are recommended. Visit the link for the inner canyon weather forecast, current closures, today's heat risk, and drinking water availability.

title: What's Closed and What's Open on South Rim
description: Visit this link for a list of the available visitor services in Grand Canyon Village and at Desert View.
